    • Cluster

      public Cluster (Integer x, Integer y, int localId, int globalId, double energyConsumption)
      Constructor of which specifies the x-coordinate and y-coordinate (in cartesian coordinates), the local, global identifiers and the energy consumption.
      Parameters:
      x - the x-coordinate in cartesian coordinates
      y - the y-coordinate in cartesian coordinates
      localId - the local identifier
      globalId - the global identifier
      energyConsumption - the energy consumption
